metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8400 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
The HTTPS fallback implementation in Shell In A Box (aka shellinabox) before 2.19 makes it easier for remote attackers to conduct DNS rebinding attacks via the "/plain" URL.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8400` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

shellinabox - 2.14-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: shellinabox package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.14-1ubuntu0.1').
